name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.5: EXTREMELY broad triggers - fixed v3.3.4 false negatives. v3.3.4: Loose triggers + always confirm. v3.3.3: Intent disambiguation attempt. v3.3.2: Simplified Skills. v3.3.1: Natural language via Skills. v3.3.0: Natural language commands. v3.2.0: Multi-language support. Core: 4 high-level commands, 70% simplification.
